meanings.definition: A medication used to treat severe acne.
meanings.sent1: Isotretinoin is prescribed by doctors for serious acne problems.
meanings.sent2: My dermatologist recommended isotretinoin to clear up my acne.
meanings.sent3: When my acne wouldn't go away, I turned to isotretinoin for help.
meanings.sent4: Isotretinoin is like a superhero for my skin, fighting off acne villains.
meanings.sent5: The power of isotretinoin transformed my skin from troubled to clear.

meanings.definition: The generic name for the drug Accutane.
meanings.sent1: Accutane is another name for isotretinoin.
meanings.sent2: My pharmacist explained that isotretinoin is the same as Accutane.
meanings.sent3: I always mix up Accutane and isotretinoin - they sound so similar!
meanings.sent4: Isotretinoin, also known as Accutane, is a powerful acne treatment.
meanings.sent5: The label on the bottle read 'Isotretinoin (Accutane)' - it's the same thing!
